pages.privacy-policy: PlayPit - Privacy Policy for User Data Protection +91-402-9563636 playpit@gmail.com PlayPit Home Why are we To learn more Join Advantages Categories of games Privacy Policy Information We May Collect From You We may collect and process the following data about you: Information that you provide by filling in forms on our site. This includes information provided at the time of registering to use our site, subscribing to our service, posting material, or requesting further services. We may also ask you for information when you enter a competition or promotion sponsored by us, and when you report a problem with our site. If you contact us, we may keep a record of that correspondence. We may also ask you to complete surveys that we use for research purposes, although you do not have to respond to them. Details of transactions you carry out through our site and of the fulfillment of your orders. Details of your visits to our site including, but not limited to, traffic data, location data, weblogs, and other communication data, whether this is required for our own billing purposes or otherwise and the resources that you access. IP Addresses We may collect information about your computer, including where available your IP address, operating system, and browser type, for system administration and to report aggregate information to our advertisers. This is statistical data about our users' browsing actions and patterns and does not identify any individual. Cookies Our website uses cookies to distinguish you from other users of our website. This helps us to provide you with a good experience when you browse our website and also allows us to improve our site. For detailed information on the cookies we use and the purposes for which we use them see our Cookie policy. Uses Made of the Information We use information held about you in the following ways: To ensure that content from our site is presented in the most effective manner for you and for your computer. To provide you with information, products, or services that you request from us or which we feel may interest you, where you have consented to be contacted for such purposes. To carry out our obligations arising from any contracts entered into between you and us. To allow you to participate in interactive features of our service when you choose to do so. To notify you about changes to our service. We may disclose your personal information to third parties: In the event that we sell or buy any business or assets, in which case we may disclose your personal data to the prospective seller or buyer of such business or assets. If PlayPit or substantially all of its assets are acquired by a third party, in which case personal data held by it about its customers will be one of the transferred assets. If we are under a duty to disclose or share your personal data in order to comply with any legal obligation, or in order to enforce or apply our terms of use and other agreements; or to protect the rights, property, or safety of PlayPit, our customers, or others. This includes exchanging information with other companies and organizations for the purposes of fraud protection and credit risk reduction. We strive to maintain the highest standards of security, however, the transmission of information via the internet is not completely secure. Although we will do our best to protect your personal data, we cannot guarantee the security of your data transmitted to our site; any transmission is at your own risk. Once we have received your information, we will use strict procedures and security features to try to prevent unauthorized access. Uses Made of the Information We use information held about you in the following ways: To ensure that content from our site is presented in the most effective manner for you and for your computer. To provide you with information, products, or services that you request from us or which we feel may interest you, where you have consented to be contacted for such purposes. To carry out our obligations arising from any contracts entered into between you and us. To allow you to participate in interactive features of our service when you choose to do so. To notify you about changes to our service. We may also use your data, or permit selected third parties to use your data, to provide you with information about goods and services which may be of interest to you and we or they may contact you about these by post or telephone. Contact Questions, comments, and requests regarding this privacy policy are welcomed and should be addressed to playpit@gmail.com. pages.terms-conditions: PlayPit - Terms of Use and Service Agreement +91-402-9563636 playpit@gmail.com PlayPit Home Why are we To learn more Join Advantages Categories of games Terms of Use Acceptance of Terms By using PlayPit's services, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Use at any time, and your continued use of our services indicates your acceptance of the updated terms. Description of Services PlayPit provides a platform for offline gaming, allowing users to engage in various games and activities without the need for an internet connection. Our services include access to a library of games, game recommendations, and user support. User Conduct As a user of PlayPit, you agree to: Use our services for personal and non-commercial purposes only. Not engage in any activity that interferes with or disrupts our services. Not use our services to transmit, distribute, or store any material that is unlawful, defamatory, harassing, or otherwise objectionable. Not attempt to gain unauthorized access to our services or any related systems or networks. Account Registration and Security To access certain features of PlayPit, you may be required to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password, and for restricting access to your computer. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account or password. Privacy PlayPit is committed to protecting your privacy. Our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms of Use, explains how we collect, use, and disclose information about you. By using our services, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your information as described in our Privacy Policy. Termination PlayPit reserves the right to terminate or suspend your access to our services at any time, without prior notice, and for any reason. Upon termination, all rights granted to you under these Terms of Use will immediately cease. Disclaimer of Warranties PlayPit provides its services "as is" and without any warranty, express or implied. We do not guarantee that our services will be uninterrupted, error-free, or free of viruses or other harmful components. Limitation of Liability In no event shall PlayPit be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or exemplary damages resulting from your use or inability to use our services. Governing Law These Terms of Use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which PlayPit is headquartered. Any legal action or proceeding arising out of or related to these Terms of Use shall be instituted exclusively in the federal or state courts located in that jurisdiction. User Content PlayPit may allow users to submit, post, or transmit content, such as game reviews, comments, or feedback. By submitting any content, you grant PlayPit a perpetual, irrevocable, worldwide, royalty-free, and non-exclusive license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, create derivative works from, distribute, and display such content in any form, media, or technology. You represent and warrant that you own or have the necessary rights to submit the content and that the content does not infringe any intellectual property or proprietary rights of any third party. Game Licensing and Ownership PlayPit's offline games are licensed, not sold, to you for personal, non-commercial use. PlayPit and its licensors retain all right, title, and interest in and to the games, including all intellectual property rights therein. You may not copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works based on the games without the express written consent of PlayPit or the applicable licensor. Game Updates and Modifications PlayPit reserves the right to update, modify, or discontinue any of its offline games at any time, without prior notice. We may also impose limits on certain features and services or restrict your access to part or all of the services without notice or liability. You agree that we will not be liable to you or any third party for any modification, suspension, or discontinuance of the services or any part thereof. In-Game Currencies and Purchases PlayPit's offline games may include virtual currencies, items, or other in-game purchases ("In-Game Purchases"). In-Game Purchases are for personal, non-commercial use only and may not be transferred, sold, or exchanged for cash or any other value. You acknowledge that you do not own any In-Game Purchases and that PlayPit has the absolute right to manage, regulate, control, modify, or eliminate such In-Game Purchases as it sees fit, in its sole discretion. No Warranty for In-Game Purchases PlayPit does not warrant that In-Game Purchases will be available for any particular length of time or that they will be error-free or uninterrupted. We reserve the right to correct any errors, inaccuracies, or omissions related to In-Game Purchases at any time without prior notice. PlayPit is not responsible for any loss or damage caused by the termination or suspension of your account or access to In-Game Purchases.
